relatedBlades.title: Enterprise Strategy Group: A network perspective on SASE and SD-WAN
relatedBlades.copy:
Complexity challenges modern cybersecurity programs. IT teams are tasked with delivering a myriad of applications to employees who sit outside of traditional corporate locations, creating networking and security hurdles. Secure access service edge (SASE) technology can help address these challenges, but the level of adoption spans from organization to organization. 

TechTarget's Enterprise Strategy Group (ESG) investigates the SASE landscape with a focus on the network's role. Through a survey of IT and networking professionals, the research firm provides insights into organizations' SASE implementation strategies and identifies key trends in networking and security.

Download this eBook to learn about: 
- Top networking challenges in connecting employees with corporate resources
- The state of SASE adoption across enterprises
- Trends in converging networking and security teams

![Enterprise Strategy Group: A network perspective on SASE and SD-WAN](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/3VQVL3wbLl2wKNDud79gZC/eee96ff7393e925a9b667de68ffc2f0f/Screenshot_2023-07-17_at_3.46.52_PM.png)
